    public abstract class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected long gameBoardID
      long value for identifying the game board.
      private Cache prevState
      A Cache object which saves the previous state of a GameBoard for undoing the last move.
      private PlayingPiece[][] state
      The multidimensional PlayingPiece array represents the game board.

      • saveStateToMemento

        private void saveStateToMemento(PlayingPiece[][] state)
        Saves a given state into Cache. If there already exists a previous state for the gameBoardID it will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        state - PlayingPiece[][]
